title: DBMS Level 10 â€” Transactions, ACID & Indexing
intro: This level covers transactions, ACID properties, and basic indexing concepts.
points: Understand what a transaction is (logical unit of work).
ACID properties: Atomicity, Consistency, Isolation, Durability.
Basic idea of concurrency issues: dirty read, lost update (concept).
What is an index and why it speeds up searches.
Difference between clustered and non-clustered indexes (conceptual).
